structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
SHERIFFS, CONSTABLES, AND COUNTY POLICE FORCE

law.text: Any money due an outgoing sheriff, other than compensation for the collection of taxes, remaining unpaid because of pending litigation shall be paid to the outgoing sheriff at the conclusion of the litigation.
law.history: Created 1958 Ky. Acts ch. 53, sec. 1, effective June 19, 1958.
